lyrics: もうすぐ　逢えるね　あの日から二年もさまよい　振り返る旅路の果てには　君がいた今すぐ　帰るよ　許してくれるね揺れてる　心は　誰のもの何度も　この髪　変えたのに貴方は　いつなら　気がつくのあの日の　言葉を　信じていいのね今夜ふたり　秘密の場所待っていよう　きっと.....　pour toujoursはぐれないで　迷わないで愛はここに　辿り着くはずクリスマス　キャンドル　灯がともり雪降る　街角　足早に家路につくのは　男たち誰もが　同じさ　愛する人のため今夜ふたり　秘密の場所夢のつづき　そっと.....　tout doucement見つめあって　思い出して愛を永遠に　ひとつに束ねてLa la la la ～La la la la ～.....　pour longtemp今夜ふたり　歩き出そう愛を連れて　新しい旅に
translated_lyrics: ♫ I'll be there for two years ♫ ♫ I'll be back home ♫ ♫ I'll be right back. ♫ ♫ I'll forgive you. ♫ ♫ My heart is shaky ♫ ♫ My heart is shaky ♫ ♫ You have changed this hair ♫ ♫ And when you're going to believe me ♫ ♫ I'm sure you'll be waiting for you tonight ♫ ♫ I'm sure you'll wait for the secret. ♫　pour toujours, don't get lost, love is going to be here. It's a Christmas candle, it's snowy, it's snowy, it's snowy, it's snowy, it's the same thing that every man has to do with the same thing: tonight, the man's love, the secret place, the secret place, the dream of the dream.　The tout doucement stare reminds me that love is bound to one forever, La la la la ~ La la la la la ~ ..La la la ~ .....　pour longtemp tonight, let' s walk out of the way for a new journey with love.
